pma:database.name: cdcxml
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `certificateur` ( `idClient` varchar(8) NOT NULL, `idContrat` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `emetteur` varchar(8) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idClient`), KEY `emetteur` (`emetteur`), CONSTRAINT `certificateur_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`emetteur`) REFERENCES `emetteur` (`idClient`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `certification` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `type` enum('RNCP','RS','Diplôme d''Etablissement','Diplôme Universitaire','Habilitation','Reconnaissance') NOT NULL, `code` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `natureDeposant` enum('CERTIFICATEUR','TIERS_CONFIANCE') DEFAULT NULL, `certificateur` varchar(8) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `emetteur` ( `idClient` varchar(8) NOT NULL, `flux` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idClient`), KEY `flux` (`flux`), CONSTRAINT `emetteur_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`flux`) REFERENCES `flux` (`idFlux`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `modalitesinscription` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `modaliteAcces` enum('FORMATION_INITIALE_HORS_APPRENTISSAGE','FORMATION_INITIALE_APPRENTISSAGE','FORMATION_CONTINUE_HORS_CONTRAT_DE_PROFESSIONNALISATION','FORMATION_CONTINUE_CONTRAT_DE_PROFESSIONNALISATION','VAE','EQUIVALENCE_(DIPLOME_ETRANGER)','CANDIDAT_LIBRE','nil') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'nil', `voieAccessVAE` enum('CONGES_VAE','VAE_CLASSIQUE') DEFAULT NULL, `initiativeInscription` enum('CERTIFIE','OF','POLE_EMPLOI','EMPLOYEUR','AUTRE') DEFAULT NULL, `dateInscription` date DEFAULT NULL, `passageCertification` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `niveaunumeriqueeuropeen` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `scoreGeneral` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `passageCertification` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `passageCertification` (`passageCertification`), CONSTRAINT `niveaunumeriqueeuropeen_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`passageCertification`) REFERENCES `passagecertification` (`idTechnique`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `passagecertification` ( `idTechnique` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `urlPreuve` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `libelleOption` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `obtentionCertification` enum('PAR_ADMISSION','PAR_SCORING') NOT NULL, `donneeCertifiee` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `dateDebutExamen` date DEFAULT NULL, `dateFinExamen` date DEFAULT NULL, `modalitePassageExamen` enum('A_DISTANCE','EN_PRESENTIEL','MIXTE') DEFAULT NULL, `codePostalCentreExamen` varchar(9) DEFAULT NULL, `dateDebutValidite` date DEFAULT NULL, `dateFinValidite` date NOT NULL, `presenceNiveauLangueEuro` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `niveauLangueEuropeen` enum('C2','C1','B2','B1','A2','A1','INSUFFISANT') DEFAULT NULL, `presenceNiveauNumeriqueEuro` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `scoring` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'nil', `mentionValidee` enum('SANS_MENTION','MENTION_ASSEZ_BIEN','MENTION_BIEN','MENTION_TRES_BIEN','MENTION_TRES_BIEN_AVEC_FELICITATIONS_DU_JURY') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'SANS_MENTION', `verbatim` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `certification` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idTechnique`), KEY `certification` (`certification`), CONSTRAINT `passagecertification_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`certification`) REFERENCES `certification` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `resultat` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `niveau` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `domaineCompetenceId` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, `competenceId` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, `niveaunumeriqueeuropeen` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `niveaunumeriqueeuropeen` (`niveaunumeriqueeuropeen`), CONSTRAINT `resultat_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`niveaunumeriqueeuropeen`) REFERENCES `niveaunumeriqueeuropeen` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `titulaire` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `nomNaissance` varchar(60) NOT NULL, `nomUsage` varchar(60) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'nil', `prenom1` varchar(60) NOT NULL, `prenom2` varchar(60) DEFAULT NULL, `prenom3` varchar(60) DEFAULT NULL, `anneeNaissance` int(11) NOT NULL, `moisNaissance` int(11) NOT NULL, `jourNaissance` int(11) NOT NULL, `sexe` enum('F','M') NOT NULL, `codeInsee` varchar(5) DEFAULT NULL, `codePostal` varchar(9) DEFAULT NULL, `libelleCommuneNaissance` varchar(40) DEFAULT NULL, `codePaysNaissance` varchar(3) DEFAULT NULL, `libellePaysNaissance` varchar(40) DEFAULT NULL, `passagecertification` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `passagecertification` (`passagecertification`), CONSTRAINT `titulaire_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`passagecertification`) REFERENCES `passagecertification` (`idTechnique`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;
